doc:
Adam Kaufman (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adam_Kaufman_(actor) 0 Adam Kaufman (born May 11, 1974) is an American actor, known for his role in 2002 in the Steven Spielberg science fiction mini-series Taken as Charlie Keys and as Parker Abrams in season 4 of Buffy the Vampire Slayer. In 1999, he starred in the unaired pilot Brookfield as Jamie Harper. Adam_Kaufman ( born May_11_,_1974 ) is an_American_actor , known for his_role in 2002 in the_Steven_Spielberg_science_fiction_mini-series Taken as Charlie_Keys and as Parker_Abrams in season_4 of Buffy the_Vampire_Slayer . In 1999 , he starred in the_unaired_pilot_Brookfield as Jamie_Harper .
